title: Neural Data Science
description: Project-based course in which students will use computational notebooks to perform exploratory data analyses and to test hypotheses in large neuroscience data sets, including the differences between unique neuron types, leveraging text mining of the neuroscience literature, and human neuroimaging analyses. Prerequisites: MATH 11 and BIPN 140 and BILD 62 or COGS 18 or CSE 8A. Students will use their own laptop computers.
